Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2012 02:48AM LynneG wrote: I'm almost 7 years post radiation, and I've also had ribs "shifting." About 3 years ago my top rib under the radiation site actually broke. Recently my GP diagonosed me with condochondritis - which is the connecting tissue of the ribs to the sternum inflamed. It felt like my rib was coming unhinged just below my bra. Only treatment is to try not to move the area. No heavy lifting or excersizing with weights, etc. It is better with comparitive inactivity. I was doing a lot of yoga - downward dog and push up type movements.
